column2: geom_linerange(aes(x = dateInYear, ymin = RecordLow, ymax = RecordHigh), color = '#ecebe3', linewidth = 1.2) +
geom_linerange(aes(x = dateInYear, ymin = NormalLow, ymax = NormalHigh), color = '#C8B8BA', linewidth = 1.2) +
geom_linerange(aes(x = dateInYear, ymin = Low, ymax = High), color = '#A90248', linewidth = 1.2)
